name: animestars-kodik-fast-player
description: Fast Kodik player replacement for animestars.org with optimized video streaming

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run webpack:prod
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run webpack:dev
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run webpack:prod
scripts.package: npm run build:prod && npm run zip:versioned
scripts.package:dev: npm run build:dev && npm run zip:versioned
scripts.release:patch: npm run version:patch && npm run package
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:minor && npm run package
scripts.release:major: npm run version:major && npm run package

author: Wholumulu
